trans-unit.source: Represents an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" /> 数字签名。

trans-unit.source: For more information about signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see Chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息中的签名定义有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅 10 章中 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>数字签名，请参阅 MSDN 文章数字签名的 Framework 的在开放式打包约定[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。

trans-unit.source: For information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]请参阅 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and set the properties of an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建和设置的属性<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> of the signature.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置签名的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The cultural information of the signature.
trans-unit.target: 签名的区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition.Culture%2A> property is optional.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition.Culture%2A>属性是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unwritten property changes exist for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> class and must be written to the package's stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> 类是否存在未写入但必须写入包的流中的属性更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if uncommitted changes exist; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在未提交的更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string value of the signature intention agreement that the signer is signing against.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置签名者在签名时所依据的签名目的协议的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the intention agreement; for example, "I have read and agree."
trans-unit.target: 一个表示目的协议的 <see cref="T:System.String" />，例如“I have read and agree”。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `Intent` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`Intent`元素中的签名定义[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅中的章节 10[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identity of the person who is requested to sign (or has signed) the package.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置被请求对包进行签名（或已签名）的人员的身份。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the signer, for example, "Mary Jones, Marketing Dept."
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />表示签名者，例如，"Mary Jones，市场营销部门"

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `SignerName` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于`SignerName`属性`SignatureDefinition`中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包。

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference in the names.
trans-unit.target: 请注意在名称中的区别。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SignerName` attribute, see chapter 10 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`SignerName`属性，请参阅章节 10 的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time by which the requested signer must sign the parts of the specified document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置请求的签名者必须对指定文档的各部件进行签名的截止日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: A (<see cref="T:System.Nullable" />) <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the deadline by which the signer must sign the package.
trans-unit.target: 一个 (<see cref="T:System.Nullable" />) <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示签名者必须对包进行签名的期限。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SignBy` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`SignBy`元素中的签名定义[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the legal jurisdiction where the package is signed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对包进行签名时所在位置的法律管辖区。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the jurisdiction, for example, "State of Utah, United States."
trans-unit.target: 一个表示管辖区的 <see cref="T:System.String" />，例如“State of Utah, United States”。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `SigningLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于`SigningLocation`元素中的签名定义[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包。

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference in the names.
trans-unit.target: 请注意在名称中的区别。

trans-unit.source: The original producer of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package can set this property.
trans-unit.target: 原始者[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the signer can set the property at the time of signing the package if no one else has already signed.
trans-unit.target: （可选） 签名者可以在对包签名，如果没有其他人已签署的时间设置属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SigningLocation` element, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`SigningLocation`元素，请参阅章 10 中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition" /> 的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: A (<see cref="T:System.Nullable" />) <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the signature definition.
trans-unit.target: 一个 (<see cref="T:System.Nullable" />) <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，表示签名定义的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: To link a `Signature` element to this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>, you must set the `Id` attribute of the `Signature` to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition.SpotId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要链接`Signature`到此元素<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>，必须设置`Id`属性`Signature`为的值<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition.SpotId%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Signature` elements, see the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`Signature`元素，请参阅[开放式打包约定](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx)架构。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SpotID` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`SpotID`属性`SignatureDefinition`中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅中的章节 10[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location that specifies where to display the visible digital signature in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于指定在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档中的何处显示可见数字签名的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.SpotLocation" /> that represents the location in the package where a visible request for a signature appears.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.SpotLocation" />，表示对签名的可见请求在包中出现的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SpotLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`SpotLocation`元素中的签名定义[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]包，请参阅中的章节 10[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范，你可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。
